remarks.format:
To create this trainer, use [FastTree](xref:Microsoft.ML.TreeExtensions.FastTree(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double)) or [FastTree(Options)](xref:"Microsoft.ML.TreeExtensions.FastTree(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,Microsoft.ML.Trainers.FastTree.FastTreeBinaryTrainer.Options)).
